name: Motion
description: The components related to X, Y, and Z motion. Select the XY component and one of the Z components.

components.name: XY
components.description: The X & Y axis motion component

components.name: Z 0.9 8x2
components.description: Z axis using 0.9 degree stepper motors & T8x2 Leadscrews

components.name: Z 0.9 8x4
components.description: Z axis using 0.9 degree stepper motors & T8x4 Leadscrews (modern kit specification)

components.name: Z 0.9 8x8
components.description: Z axis using 0.9 degree stepper motors & T8x8 Leadscrews

components.name: Z 1.8 8x2
components.description: Z axis using 1.8 degree stepper motors & T8x2 Leadscrews

components.name: Z 1.8 8x4
components.description: Z axis using 1.8 degree stepper motors & T8x4 Leadscrews

components.name: Z 1.8 8x8
components.description: Z axis using 1.8 degree stepper motors & T8x8 Leadscrews

name: Stepper Drivers
description: The stepper drivers used for The X, Y, and Z axises, as well as the Extruder.

components.name: 2660 XY
components.description: Trinamic TMC2660s for the X & Y axis

components.name: 2660 Z
components.description: Trinamic TMC2660s for the Z axis

components.name: 2660 E
components.description: Trinamic TMC2660s for the extruder

name: Probes
description: The probe used to home the Z axis.

components.name: bedmesh.cfg
components.description: bedmesh.cfg

components.name: BLTouch
components.description: Antclabs BLTouch (modern kit specification)

components.name: safe_z_home
components.description:
The safe_z_home option is used with a bltouch or other Z probe that needs to probe a specific point.
This needs to be a standalone config file encase a user wants to use homing_override.

name: Extruders
description: Extruders Known to work well, pick 0ne.

components.name: BMG
components.description: Bondtech BMG with 0.9 degree stepper (modern kit specification)

components.name: LGX Lite
components.description: Bondtech LGX Lite with LDO-32STH20-1004AHG(XH) stepper

components.name: Orbiter 1.5
components.description: LDO Orbiter V1.5 with 1004 Motor

name: Hotends
description: Hotends known to work well, pick 0ne.

components.name: hotend.cfg
components.description: hotend.cfg

components.name: V6 Al
components.description: E3D V6 Aluminum block

components.name: V6 Cu
components.description: E3D V6 Copper block

components.name: Mosquito
components.description: Slice Engineering Mosquito

name: Heaters
description: Heaters used for the bed and the chamber

components.name: Keenovo
components.description: 750W Keenovo bed heater (modern kit specification)

name: Fans
description: The various fans used in the printer

components.name: E3D 30mm
components.description: The standard fan used with E3D hotends

components.name: Mosquito 5015
components.description: A Delta 5015 (BFB0524HH) for cooling a Slice Engineering Mosquito

components.name: James Tongue
components.description: A Delta 5015 (BFB0524HH)  mounted  to James Tongue duct part cooling duct

name: Temperature Sensors
description: The various temperature sensors used in the printer

components.description: A standard 3950 thermistor mounted in the top of the bed

components.name: Keenovo
components.description: The secondary 3950 thermistor in the Keenovo heater

components.name: pt100 & daughterboard
components.description: A pt100 and daughterboard connected to the duet 2 for the hotend

components.name: RPi
components.description: The host Raspberry Pi

name: accelerometers
description: accelerometers for measuring resonance frequencies of the printer

components.name: adxl345
components.description: a standard adxl345

name: Macros
description: Various Macros that can be used to increase the functionality of Klipper

components.name: Homing
components.description: A marco that homes all 3 axis, levels the bed, and re-homes the Z

components.name: Go Home
components.description: A simple macro that sends the print head to X & Y min

components.name: Go Center
components.description: A simple macro that sends the print head to to the center of the print area

components.name: Go Park
components.description: A simple macro that sends the print head to X & Y max

components.name: Max Out
components.description: A macro to test your printers maximum acceleration & velocity settings

name: miscellaneous
description: Various settings that allow a greater range of customization

components.name: force_move
components.description: allows a user to force a stepper to move that hasn't been homed

components.name: respond
components.description: enables the use of Respond & M118
